mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Get ready to experience the most luxurious banking services tailored just for you.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, I stroll into my local coffee shop, right? I'm wearing my designer suit, shades indoors-you know, the whole Hot Josh vibe. I order my usual triple-shot, extra foam, caramel macchiato and casually mention to the barista that I'm the CEO of Bank of Entitlement. Suddenly, the cashier stops what she's doing, drops to her knees, and starts chanting 'All hail the king of entitlement!' Talk about a royal welcome! Needless to say, I took it all in stride, because let's face it, that's exactly the kind of adoration I deserve. Ah, the perks of being Hot Josh!
